This document provides the global editorial context required before any chapter
editing begins.

## Intended Audience
- Target profile (e.g. junior–mid Data Scientists)
- Expected background knowledge

## Book Objective
Describe:
- What problem the book solves
- What the reader should be able to do after finishing the book
- What the book explicitly does NOT attempt to cover

---

## Editorial Tone and Positioning
- Technical level: <introductory | intermediate | advanced>
- Style reference:
  - Professional
  - Didactic
  - Practitioner-oriented
- Not academic paper, not casual blog

---

## Constraints
- Preserve original content 100%
- Preserve original language(s)
- Editorial changes only
